com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps
Class OddsBet

java.lang.Object
  com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps.Bet
      com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps.OddsBet
Direct Known Subclasses:
DontOddsBet, LineOddsBet
public abstract class OddsBet
extends Bet

An OddsBet is attached to any LineBet type and is (optionally) set after the point of the line bet is set. Unlike the LineBet, OddsBet pays true odds based on the point established. For example, if a PassLineBet or ComeLineBet has it's point set to 5, the odds of rolling the point (4 possible rolls) before rolling craps (6 possible rolls) is 4/6 or 2/3, so a $10 bet will pay $15. This is the only bet in a casino where the house has no advantage. To avoid, non-integer results, the amountMultiple differs depending on the point. There is no minimum bet, aside from apart from the AmmountMultiple. The maximum amount of the bet varies by casino, but us usually 2 times the amount of the Pass or Come bet. The payout schedule is as follows: Point Payout AmountMultiple Example 4, 10 2-1 1 $10 bet pays $20 5, 9 3-2 2 $10 bet pays $15 6, 8 6-5 5 $10 bet pays $12

Author:
Doug Chuchro

Field Detail

MAX_ODDS_MULTIPLE

public static final int MAX_ODDS_MULTIPLE
Defines the maximum amount of an Odds bet as a multiple of the amount of the Line bet amount For example, with a value of 2, the maximum Odds bet on a Pass Line bet of $10 is $20

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

OddsBet

OddsBet(java.lang.String betName,
        int point,
        int minAmount,
        int maxAmount,
        int amtMultiple,
        java.lang.Double payoutRatio)
Constructor for an Odds bet, which calls the super (Bet) constructor, then sets the Payout Ratio, winning and losing rolls.

Parameters:
betName - Name of the bet type.
point - Point set at the come out roll of the Line bet.
minAmount - Theoretical minimum amount of the bet to be placed.
maxAmount - Theoretical maximum amount of the bet to be placed.
amtMultiple - Bet must be a multiple of this amount to have an integer payout.
payoutRatio - Ratio of payout-to-bet amount. For example 3/2 pays $3 on a $2 bet.
